programme.desc: Gordon urges the owners of a hotel, restaurant and ice cream parlor in Washington to look more closely at their business and relationships and get involved with the community.

programme.desc: Gordon revisits the Walnut Tree Inn in Welsh countryside; he wishes to see if the owner, Francesco, took his advice.

programme.title: Helicopter ER

programme.title: Helicopter ER
programme.desc: Dispatcher Paul Holmes scrambles both helicopters to attend a motorcycle accident involving two bikes; a child is injured; a difficult rescue is launched to retrieve a walker, plunged down a ravine; a cycling mum's lost memory surprises her son.

programme.title: Helicopter ER
